## Description

- F#
- G
- A
- B
- C#
- D#
- E#

- Root (F#)

- Major 6th (D#)
- Major 7th (E#)

## Genre and Musical Flavor
This scale is often used in genres that require an exotic or mysterious sound. It can be found in genres like jazz, fusion, and progressive rock.
